grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 促進【ソクシン】promotion, acceleration, encouragement, facilitation, spurring on
促成【ソクセイ】promotion of growth
督促【トクソク】urge, demand, importunity
矢の催促【ヤノサイソク】strongly and repeatedly urging (demanding, requesting, pressing)
kun reading compounds: 促す【うながす】to urge, to encourage, to press, to prompt, to draw (attention to), to stimulate (e.g. growth), to hasten (e.g. development), to quicken, to accelerate, to promote
